definition: Origin of Dharma (in Buddhism)/source of the law

sentences.english: The second part discusses the right of freedom of movement for workers within European Union.

sentences.english: So there is the sense of Learn obligation. Secondary school students are special group.

sentences.english: It is known to all that in China statute law serves as the main legal source.
sentences.chinese: 众所周知，我国是以制定法为主要法源的国家。
